projects.title: GeoViz
projects.description: a web portal using Django to help Internet Service Providers submit their coverage data by providing visualization of submitted data along with automated file validation, query resolution, and file management.

projects.title: Market Divers
projects.description: Developed visualizations in D3.js to get better insights into Data Science related jobs in the United States. Utilized visualization principles such as CRAP to build an effective data story

projects.title: Calmify
projects.description: A web application using Java EE, JSF, MySQL and deployed it on AWS to overcome the problem of mental health. It provides uplifting quotes, motivational videos from YouTube, a custom shop for mental health products integrating with PayPal for payment, and a subscription service to receive daily motivational quotes
